question: Sampanna Ramesh Shelar has set a world record to double cross the Bangla Channel, he hailed from which country?
explanation: Sampanna Ramesh Shelar, a 17-year-old swimmer from Pune, India has set a world record to double cross the Bangla Channel. Water stretch from Saint Martin's Island Jetty to Teknaf in Bangladesh is known as the Bangla Channel. Sampanna Ramesh Shelar accomplished this feat on April 13, 2018 by completing the journey of 32.2 kilometers in 9 hours and 10 minutes.
